scenario_text.value:
What’s up with them? We just left the forest
and they’re heading back in?

There might be another attack...
What if we all die? Dammit...
Kew, kew...

(I was wondering what Ryo was up to, but he
just seems to be really scared.)
(So, what should I do?)
Talk to him.
Leave him alone.
Ryo? Can you give me a hand?

I’m useless... If you need me to be in the
way, I’m here...

It’s dangerous to be alone.
C’mon. Come with me.
C’mon, Ryo!
Kewww!!! Kew!
Shut up! Leave me alone.
(Oh well. I’ll wait until he calms down.)

(We have to look for Saki and the others.
Ryo will be fine with Kunemon.)
Kewkew...

What the heck? Stay away from me!
You’re weirding me out!
Kewww...

What is it with everyone?
Why is this happening?
You okay, Ryo?

I... I just want to go home...
Mommy...

(Ryo is feeling bad again.
I’ll leave him alone for a bit.)
